Anti-venom+ is a potion that instantly cures venom and poison. It provides immunity to poison for 15 minutes and venom for approximately 3 minutes. Players can make this potion at 94 Herblore by using a torstol on an Anti-venom, granting 125 herblore experience.

Contents

  • 1 Creation
  • 2 Price per dose
  • 3 Item sources
    • 3.1 Anti-venom+(4)
  • 4 Changes

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
Date unknown

Making an anti-venom+ now takes two ticks instead of four, consistent with other potions.

15 April 2016
(update)

Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.

7 April 2016
(update)

Drinking any kind of antipoison will no longer decrease your poison immunity.

'''Anti-venom+''' is a potion that instantly cures [[venom]] and [[poison]]. It provides immunity to poison for 15 minutes and venom for approximately 3 minutes. Players can make this potion at 94 [[Herblore]] by using a [[torstol]] on an [[Anti-venom]], granting 125 herblore experience.

==Creation==
{{Recipe
|skill1 = Herblore
|skill1lvl = 94
|skill1boostable = Yes
|skill1exp = 125
|members = Yes
|ticks = 2
|mat1 = Anti-venom(4)
|mat2 = Torstol
|output1 = Anti-venom+(4)
}}

{{Price per dose|Anti-venom+}}
